Uses of Package
sheep.graphics

Packages that use sheep.graphics
sheep.game Contains classes related to game logic. 
sheep.graphics Contains all classes related to visual representations. 
 

Classes in sheep.graphics used by sheep.game
Image
          A Sprite representation which draws a transformed image onto the Canvas.
SpriteView
          This class is an abstraction over various visual representations for Sprites.
 

Classes in sheep.graphics used by sheep.graphics
Color
          This class exists to simplify the creation of predefined pure-color Paint.
Font
          This class exists primarily as a convenience when drawing text.
SpriteView
          This class is an abstraction over various visual representations for Sprites.
